msbt.message: What's the shovel for? Out burying some secrets? Bwa ha ha! Just kidding, !
You gonna fight a tree with that? I hope you had a big breakfast. Trees are tough, !
Wow, that slingshot takes me back Mine got me grounded SO MANY times, !
Oh! You've got one of those outfit changer thingamajigs. Awesome!Sodo you just throw the whole thing in the wash when you wanna do laundry, ?
It's awesome when you get the paths laid out just right and everything suddenly clicks, !
Whoa! A cliff carver! That's some heavy-duty gear, .If you wanna make an impression on a guest, a cliff's the way to do it!
Was that one of those river-digger thingies? Oh! You should make an outdoor waterfall shower!
What's up with the party popper? Where you headed? Can I come?<10_4 /> Nah, it's good. Have fun!
You cool with heights? I mean, you got that ladder there, so I guess so, !I like 'em too. Ever heard the saying, " and balloons love high places?"<10_4 /> Never?! Huh, weird.

Isis that a vaulting pole? That's awesome, !Hey, I bet if you put enough oomph into it, you could fling yourself all the way to the next island!OK, that's a mega stretch, but it'd be soooo rad if you did, !

Hey, is that a tweeter? Ha! Cool! The noise those things make is mega annoying, . A buddy of mine once tried to put together an all-tweeter band. Just five of us on tweeters.We even had a gigsorta. We got halfway through our opener before the owner kicked us out. Bwa ha ha!
Got a bubble blower, huh? There's something justchill about watching bubbles float on the breeze, huh?

Pretty cool pinwheel you got there. I could never get the hang of keeping those things spinning, .Like, with the constant breeze here, you'd think that'd be super easy, even for me. Nope. Won't budge.
Those fans are rad. They're pretty, and they're mega handy when it gets hot. If only they didn't tear so easy.
I like the sparkler. Really brings out the mischief in your eyes. Bwa ha ha!Just keep some water around in case stuff gets out of hand. Ugh I sound like my mom,

That balloon kinda reminds me of something from when I was little.I was at a fair with my parents, and I really wanted this balloon with a cool drawing of on it.I threw this HUUUUGE tantrum. My parents didn't know what to do. Everyone was staring. It was bad.That's not the worst part though. The worst part is that I was definitely old enough to know better.Ugh! So embarrassing. Dad still teases me about it now and then, andI deserve it, .

Nice net! You off to catch some bugs? Oh, you've never caught one? You're a bug-hunting newbie! Cool!So, quick tip—creep up on a bug real slow, then SWING! You'll be rolling in bugs in no time, !Umfiguratively rolling in bugs, I mean. Eww.
Gonna catch some bugs? Happy hunting, !Oh! Quick tip—if bugs keep escaping, hold  as you're sneaking up on 'em. When the time's right, just let go!
Hey, . Anyone ever tell you how awesome you look with that net?So what bugs're you after today? Whatever it is, I hope you catch it, !
You're like a bug-catching wizard! You just wave that net around and BAM! More bugs for the museum!I used to think I was pretty good at bug catching, but you Yeah, I can't compete, !
You caught EVERY type of bug. That's justunreal to me.That takes a ton of dedication, . You're like the Bug Baron of !I'm seriously, massively, gigantically impressed, !
Goin' fishin'? Oh! You've never caught anything? Well, it's not too tough, .The main thing to know is that fish spook easy. You gotta sneak to the water's edge real slow. Good luck!
How's the fishing going? Still getting your feet wet, ?I'm not great at fishing, but here's a tip—take your time. Patience is key which is exactly why I'm so bad at it!
How's your anglin'? I heard about this spot where the river hits the sea. I guess fish love it there!I know, I know, you probably hit that spot every day, . But it was news to me!
Now THAT'S the look of someone ready for a fishfight. Those critters are in for it now!Hey, when you've got a minute, maybe you can share a few tips with me, !

Did I hear right? You caught EVERY type of fish? That's just How?! And here you are, ready for more!Keep this up and there's gonna be more fish in the museum than the ocean, !I love how dedicated you are! Amazing!
That watering can Are YOU the one who's been watering the flowers around here?Hey, anyone who's a friend of flowers is a friend of mine, .
A watering can? In this weather?That's some serious dedication. Keep at it! Make those flowers feel like a million Bells, !
I'm diggin' that umbrella. It's very you. This weather, though, ain't very umbrella, .

When I was little, I knew this kid who was always trying to start a sword fight with his umbrella.One day we dueled and I kinda poked a hole in his umbrella. He got soaked. I still feel bad about that
